findings.title: Unchecked return value of external transfer/transferFrom
findings.description: The return value of an external transfer/transferFrom is checked, but it can be fixed and will not bring problems.

findings.title: Unprotected blacklist functions
findings.description: The owner can blacklist addresses without any restrictions.
findings.location: Contract CMOVE (functions addBlackList, addBlackLists, removeBlackList, removeBlackLists)
